charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_1201_0200_1:
Apologies for calling you like this all of a
sudden.
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_1201_0300_1:
I invited you because I felt it’d be more
effective to train together, rather than by
myself.
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_1201_0400_1:
I, Cress, want to become a full-fledged
Gym Leader. Please, lend me your help!
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_0401_0600_1: Thank you. I’m glad you’re here.
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_0402_0800_1: Yes, let’s give it our all!
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_1201_1100_1:
Sorry, I just remembered a fight I had with
my brother Chili, who’s a Fire-type user.
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_1201_1200_1:
We were arguing whether to train in an
area with volcanoes or one with glaciers.
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_1201_1300_1:
It got heated, so Simipour doused us with
water to make us chill out.
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_1201_1400_1:
Where you train isn’t as important as who
you train with, really.
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_1201_1500_1:
Plus, I’m not trying to get stronger for just
my own sake.
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_1201_1600_1:
Water helps grass grow...and fire helps
water boil.
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_1201_1700_1:
So any improvement I make should help my
brothers as well.
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_1201_1800_1:
We all support each other and grow stronger
together.
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_1201_1900_1: I hope you can help us, too!
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_0401_2100_1:
Let’s make our teamwork so strong,
we won’t lose to any other team!
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_0302_2200_1: Let’s do it for each other!
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_0402_2300_1:
Yes, let’s! I’m sure you also have rivals
you’d rather not lose to.
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_1201_2400_1:
But back to the question of where to train...
Do you have anywhere in mind?
charaepi_ch0146_00_corn/2301_1201_2500_1:
If not, Simipour and I—Cress—can show you
the perfect spot!
